author: Danielle Wallace
title: Alabama barbershop to reopen defying coronavirus stay-at-home order to save business
description: An Alabama barbershop plans to reopen its doors Friday, flouting a statewide stay-at-home order closing all non-essential businesses to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
